mapper.insert: INSERT INTO messageQueue(token,latitude,longitude,vehicleno,busstation,laststation) VALUES(#{_token},${_latitude},${_longitude},#{_vehicleno},#{_busstation},#{_laststation}) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE latitude = ${_latitude}, longitude = ${_longitude}, vehicleno = #{_vehicleno}, busstation = #{_busstation}, laststation = #{_laststation}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM user WHERE user.token in (SELECT token FROM messageQueue)
